com.robindrew.common.io.data

Class DataWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • java.io.DataOutputStream
          • com.robindrew.common.io.data.DataWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataWriter, java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataOutput, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ByteArrayDataWriter

    public class DataWriter
extends java.io.DataOutputStream
implements IDataWriter
